circumstances: Shortly after takeoff from Memphis Airport, while in initial climb, both engines failed. The airplane stalled and crashed in an open field. The pilot, sole on board, was seriously injured while the aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause:
Double engine failure during initial climb due to fuel exhaustion. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Inadequate preflight preparation, 
- Fuel exhaustion, 
- Overload failure, 
- Complete engine failure two engines, 
- Gear collapsed.
